def baseN(N, B, numerals, carry=False):
    I = ''
    while N > 0:
        R = N % B
        I = numerals[R] + I
        N /= B
        if R == 0 and carry: N -= 1
    return int(I or '0')

def m(k):
    v = '0123456789'
    return v[:k] + v[k+1:]

def process(N, L):
    if L == 0:
        return baseN(N, 9, '912345678', True)
    else:
        return baseN(N, 9, m(L))

def main():
    T = int(raw_input())
    for t in xrange(T):
        N, L = map(int, raw_input().split())
        print process(N, L)

main()
